侧心血管腔内的异常交通。右侧心血管腔内的静脉血，通过异常交通分流入左侧心血管腔，大量静脉血注入体循环，故可出现持续性青紫。如法洛四联症、法洛三联症、右心室双出口和完全性大动脉转位、永存动脉干等。\",\"keyword2Code\":null,\"questionId\":\"2b037854781d41669d318271a56dfc5b\",\"practiseId\":\"\",\"no\":397,\"keyword1Code\":null,\"typeCode\":\"06\",\"keyword3Code\":null,\"favorite\":\"false\",\"mainType\":\"0\",\"qSort\":\"\",\"rightResult\":\"E\",\"bankId\":null,\"bankCode\":null,\"createTimeStr\":null,\"isWritten\":\"\",\"correct\":\"\",\"favoriteId\":\"\",\"mainId\":\"\",\"answerResult\":null,\"mainTopic\":\"\"},{\"topic\":\"定量测定肺动脉收缩压值可用以下哪种方法\",\"linkNo\":398,\"choiceAnswers\":[{\"operation\":null,\"sort\":null,\"correct\":true,\"choiceId\":\"7d03ceb614d54ad69f9fcc4aeba8d6b6\",\"mark\":\"A\",\"resultId\":null,\"choiceAnswer\":\"测定肺动脉瓣或三尖瓣反流压差法\"},{\"operation\":null,\"sort\":null,\"correct\":false,\"choiceId\":\"4e17878d25204dd091aaefa3741ead44\",\"mark\":\"B\",\"resultId\":null,\"choiceAnswer\":\"测定主动脉瓣或二尖瓣反流压差法\"},{\"operation\":null,\"sort\":null,\"correct\":false,\"choiceId\":\"4e0addd8dec542f6934ef2a2045b8d92\",\"mark\":\"C\",\"resultId\":null,\"choiceAnswer\":\"测定M型超声肺动脉瓣曲线α波深度\"},{\"operation\":null,\"sort\":null,\"correct\":false,\"choiceId\":\"1ce55550ad234720a0d488c33f833b39\",\"mark\":\"D\",\"resultId\":null,\"choiceAnswer\":\"存在房间隔缺损时测定左至右分流压差法\"},{\"operation\":null,\"sort\":null,\"correct\":false,\"choiceId\":\"9e8505ffcba9487c9e73fd94f5b49c4c\",\"mark\":\"E\",\"resultId\":null,\"choiceAnswer\":\"测定收缩期肺动脉跨瓣压差法\"}],\"keyword4Code\":null,\"answerAnalyse\":\"\",\"keyword2Code\":null,\"questionId\":\"2b0a284ce21941519385bd2a4aa07d8c\",\"practiseId\":\"\",\"no\":398,\"keyword1Code\":null,\"typeCode\":\"06\",\"keyword3Code\":null,\"favorite\":\"false\",\"mainType\":\"0\",\"qSort\":\"\",\"rightResult\":\"A\",\"bankId\":null,\"bankCode\":null,\"createTimeStr\":null,\"isWritten\":\"\",\"correct\":\"\",\"favoriteId\":\"\",\"mainId\":\"\",\"answerResult\":null,\"mainTopic\":\"\"},{\"topic\":\"门静脉由哪两条静脉汇合而成？\",\"linkNo\":399,\"choiceAnswers\":[{\"operation\":nu
